ArticleTitle.sentence: Tandem AP-1-binding sites within the human beta-globin dominant control region function as an inducible enhancer in erythroid cells.

event.clue: Tandem AP-1-binding sites within the human beta-globin dominant control region function as an inducible enhancer in erythroid cells.

AbstractText.sentence: A powerful enhancer has been mapped to an 18-bp DNA segment located 11 kb 5' to the human epsilon-globin gene within the dominant control or locus-activating region.
This enhancer is inducible in K562 human erythroleukemia cells, increasing linked gamma-globin promoter/luciferase gene expression to 170-fold over an enhancerless construct.

event.clue: This enhancer is inducible in K562 human erythroleukemia cells, increasing linked gamma-globin promoter/luciferase gene expression to 170-fold over an enhancerless construct.
This enhancer is inducible in K562 human erythroleukemia cells, increasing linked gamma-globin promoter/luciferase gene expression to 170-fold over an enhancerless construct.

event.comment: TPS: A24; NER: T11 del "gamma-globin promoter/luciferase gene expression"; NER T14 del "gene expression"

event.clue: This enhancer is inducible in K562 human erythroleukemia cells, increasing linked gamma-globin promoter/luciferase gene expression to 170-fold over an enhancerless construct.

AbstractText.sentence: The enhancer consists of tandem AP-1-binding sites, phased 10 bp apart, which are both required for full activity.

event.clue: The enhancer consists of tandem AP-1-binding sites, phased 10 bp apart, which are both required for full activity.

AbstractText.sentence: DNA-protein binding assays with nuclear extracts from induced cells demonstrate a high molecular weight complex on the enhancer.

event.clue: DNA-protein binding assays with nuclear extracts from induced cells demonstrate a high molecular weight complex on the enhancer.

AbstractText.sentence: The formation of this complex also requires both AP-1 sites and correlates with maximal enhancer activity.

event.clue: The formation of this complex also requires both AP-1 sites and correlates with maximal enhancer activity.
The formation of this complex also requires both AP-1 sites and correlates with maximal enhancer activity.
The formation of this complex also requires both AP-1 sites and correlates with maximal enhancer activity.

AbstractText.sentence: Induction of the enhancer may have a role in the increase in globin gene transcription that characterizes erythroid maturation.

event.clue: Induction of the enhancer may have a role in the increase in globin gene transcription that characterizes erythroid maturation.

AbstractText.sentence: Enhancer activity appears to be mediated by the binding of a complex of proteins from the jun and fos families to tandem AP-1 consensus sequences.

event.clue: Enhancer activity appears to be mediated by the binding of a complex of proteins from the jun and fos families to tandem AP-1 consensus sequences.
